data.description:
Introducing "Blossom Whisper," a revolutionary MR game designed to unleash the magic within you through the simplest gestures: your movement and breath. This game peels away the complexities of traditional gaming, immersing you in a world where your actions create effortless beauty. Without the need for set objectives or learning complicated moves, the magic of "Blossom Whisper" lies in encouraging you to explore and express your physical potential in the most natural and comfortable ways.

As you launch the game, you're greeted with a cascade of petals and flower particles that respond to your every movement and breath. Imagine controlling nature, creating stunning visual effects with a wave of your hand or a deep breath, all without any prior training or instruction. "Blossom Whisper" celebrates your unique expression and movement, making every action a beautiful testament to your presence.

Targeted towards women and teenagers, "Blossom Whisper" is not just a game; it's a journey to relaxation and self-discovery. It promotes a healthy lifestyle and mindfulness, creating a space where fitness and beauty blend seamlessly. With no pressure to achieve specific goals, you're free to explore the joy of movement in your own way, discovering the magic and love inherent in every gesture.

changelog.change_log: Version 0.9 has had significant updates. The following features have been added: 1. Japanese, English, and Chinese language versions with voice guidance; 2. A new water lily scene.
Version 0.8 The redbud flower has been replaced with a realistic style, and the action guidance voice at the beginning of the game has been added.
This version is free for early access for 30 days
